## \_getFirstDayOfMonth() function

Get the first day of a specified month

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getFirstDayOfMonth(date?: Immutable<DateInput>): Immutable<Date>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | Immutable&lt;DateInput&gt; | A date with the desired month |
